roleset.name: natural disaster: tropical cyclone
roleset.note: HURRICANE-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to cyclone, twister, tornado, typhoon. (from hurricane.01-n)

roles.note: The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

example.name: hurricane-n: arg1
example.text: On a sudden, experienced a stroke of wind from the N.W. so unexpected and tremendous, that we had scarce time to lower thesails, and were compelled to take it in poop, encountering for an hour a hurricane of wind and sea from the N.W. meeting the old seafrom the S.W. in such a manner that at every pitch the ship made her bowsprit was under water, at the same time labouring so much that the sea washed entirely over us, and we were obliged to nail up every aperture.
example.arg: of wind and sea from the N.W. meeting the old sea from the S.W. in such a manner that at every pitch the ship made her bowsprit was under water

example.name: hurricane-n: arg2
example.text: It is based on a scale from one to five with one being the lowest intensity hurricane and five being the highest intensity hurricane.
